statements: SELECT * FROM recruitment_tool_integration;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email FROM recruitment_tool_integration;
SELECT candidate_name, background_check_status FROM recruitment_tool_integration WHERE background_check_status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM recruitment_tool_integration WHERE onboarding_status='In Progress';
SELECT id, candidate_name, candidate_email FROM recruitment_tool_integration ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_tool_integration WHERE background_check_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY candidate_name DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email FROM recruitment_tool_integration WHERE background_check_status = 'Completed' AND onboarding_status = 'Ready';
SELECT candidate_name, background_check_status FROM recruitment_tool_integration WHERE background_check_status != 'Pending' ORDER BY candidate_name;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_tool_integration WHERE background_check_status = 'Pending' AND candidate_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT candidate_name, onboarding_status FROM recruitment_tool_integration WHERE onboarding_status = 'Pending' OR onboarding_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM recruitment_tools;
SELECT tool_name, tool_type FROM recruitment_tools ORDER BY tool_type DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email FROM candidate_information WHERE background_check_status = 'Approved';
SELECT tool_name, tool_type, integration_method FROM recruitment_tools WHERE tool_type = 'Assessment';
SELECT * FROM candidate_information ORDER BY candidate_name ASC, candidate_email DESC;
SELECT tool_name, tool_type FROM recruitment_tools;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_tools WHERE tool_type = 'ATS';
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email, background_check_status FROM candidate_information ORDER BY background_check_status DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email, onboarding_status FROM candidate_information WHERE onboarding_status = 'pending' ORDER BY candidate_name ASC;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email, candidate_phone FROM candidate_information WHERE candidate_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM sourcing_candidates;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email FROM sourcing_candidates;
SELECT process_id, process_status, process_start_date FROM onboarding_processes;
SELECT candidate_name, creation_date, candidate_email FROM sourcing_candidates ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT check_id, check_type, check_status, check_date FROM background_checks WHERE check_status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM sourcing_candidates;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email FROM sourcing_candidates;
SELECT candidate_id, candidate_name, creation_date FROM sourcing_candidates ORDER BY candidate_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM background_checks WHERE check_status = 'Pending';
SELECT candidate_id, process_status FROM onboarding_processes WHERE process_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY process_start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_tool;
SELECT tool_name FROM recruitment_tool ORDER BY tool_name ASC;
SELECT id, tool_name FROM recruitment_tool WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM candidate WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM candidate WHERE last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM recruitment_tool;
SELECT tool_name, integration_key FROM recruitment_tool WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT candidate.first_name, candidate.last_name, background_status FROM candidate JOIN background_check ON candidate.id = background_check.candidate_id;
SELECT tool_name, integration_key FROM recruitment_tool ORDER BY tool_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM candidate WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM candidates;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM background_checks WHERE result = 'Pass';
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM onboarding_tasks WHERE is_completed = false;
SELECT candidate_id, doc_type, uploaded_at FROM documents ORDER BY uploaded_at DESC;
SELECT interviewer_name, scheduled_datetime, feedback FROM interviews WHERE candidate_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE status='Hired';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM candidates WHERE candidate_id IN (SELECT candidate_id FROM background_checks WHERE result='Passed');
SELECT candidate_id, result FROM background_checks WHERE date_completed > '2022-01-01';
SELECT doc_type, file_path FROM documents WHERE uploaded_at < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY uploaded_at DESC;
SELECT task_name, description FROM onboarding_tasks WHERE due_date < '2022-04-30' AND is_completed = false;
